r.s: Providing a somewhat unified API for handling
r.d: XML_Feed_Parser is a parser for (the various) RSS and Atom format XML feeds. It attempts to provide a somewhat unified API while still allowing access to the full details of each feed type.
r.n: First beta release Added support for 'content' namespace in RSS2 Further consistency fixes Added prototype conversion script for Universal Feed Parser tests Fixed bug in main __call function that led to problems when the same attribute was accessed multiple times
